programme.title: Reykjavik Summit, October 1986
programme.short_synopsis: Reagan and Gorbachev's disarmament summit in Reykjavik ends in failure.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev's disarmament summit in Reykjavik ends in failure after Reagan's refusal to abandon the Strategic Defence Initiative.
